newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - July 25.
newsitem.headline: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - July 25.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Malaysian stocks on Friday:
* On Thursday, the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 28.57 points or 0.35 percent to 8116.93, its third consecutive record high closing.
* The Kuala Lumpur Composite Index gained 11.82 points or 1.14 percent to 1,045.89, as cheapened stocks continued to be bought up.
* Ringgit quoted at 2.6405/20 a dollar at around 0035 GMT, up from 2.6460/90 at the close of Kuala Lumpur trading on Thursday.
